title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Riots and civil unrests against banks goverments and leaders who have created all the mess by their greed.Places locations and Nations and countries where people help each other and try to be as team or in group the riots Will be most bad becouse they will mob up and Also they was most against covid 19 scam so it means they don't obey and Will not stay calm anyways they will burn up everything from the anger and fruturation.No riots in some countries like eastern Europe countries becouse over there people don't search for justice and are fine with that capitalists and wealthy Will take it all any other countries people Will not stay calm.Former soviet Unioni countries people Are use to with suffering so they don't complain and they Are use to with that olicars and leaders take it all and corruption Are normal over there so Even people see goverments been messed up everthing they don't go and dont Riot.All other places people gona go to Riot Off course switzerland people not and south france and Monaco residents dont.World Will look like this soon: The few good places like Monaco where no problems and eastern Europe zone where most people will be robbed poor and few rich ones who will just watching how other 90% Will be poor but those poor ones in Eastern europe never do riots and If they do they do it calm way.The places where Will be biggest riots and civil unrests Will be off course. UK canada and USA and ireland. Cities like London,Manchester,Birmingham will be one If the worse case scenario locations.Also the USA California and Atlanta area where the most riots Will start.Europe Will be worse case riots off course germany france netherland and spain.Off course sweden and Norway Will be one the bad places when things Will go to ugly finland not so bad.But UK will be number one ugly place.
